project.name: |-- 003-async-vs-parallel
project.description:
Keywords: + Future + CompletableFuture + Parallel
This project includes a very simple example that illustrates the use of asynchronous calls and parallel streams.
BestPriceFinderRunner: Demonstrates how compares in terms of programming model and scalability the use of asynchronous programming using CompletableFutures and parallel stream programming.
